RelatedSentence: Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered all troops stationed along the border with Ukraine to withdraw , the Kremlin said on Monday .
Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered all troops stationed along the border with Ukraine to withdraw , the Kremlin said on Monday .
